decks.notes: This Mystic Forge combo deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to generate infinite mana and card advantage, utilizing artifacts and key combo pieces like Voltaic Key and Ugin, Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pithing Needle and Karn, the Great Creator to control the board. The synergy between artifacts and powerful planeswalkers like Tezzeret, Cruel Captain and Karn allows for explosive plays and consistent access to powerful threats. The deck's mana base is optimized for fast mana production and resilience, enabling swift and decisive victories.

The main strategy of this deck revolves around using various spells and creatures to quickly reanimate powerful creatures from the graveyard, such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck includes cards like Entomb, Reanimate, and Animate Dead to facilitate this strategy. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats early in the game while also having ways to disrupt their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to control the pace of the game by disrupting your opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will, while simultaneously applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf. The deck utilizes tempo plays with cards like Daze and Brazen Borrower to keep the opponent off balance, while also using disruptive spells like Fatal Push to deal with threats. By combining aggressive creatures with disruptive elements, this deck aims to create a fast-paced and versatile game plan that can adapt to different matchups in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void while quickly deploying powerful threats like Dragon Stompy. It aims to control the board and pressure the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, ultimately overwhelming them before they can stabilize. The deck's synergy between its disruption and threats creates a proactive game plan that can quickly close out games. By using efficient mana acceleration and disruptive elements, it can punish opponents who rely heavily on non-basic lands or spell-based strategies.

The deck aims to quickly assemble the Dark Depths combo, which involves creating a 20/20 indestructible Marit Lage token by removing all ice counters from Dark Depths. The deck includes cards to search for the Dark Depths combo pieces, protect the combo with counterspells like Not of This World, and disrupt the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Duress and Thoughtseize. The deck also includes ways to generate mana quickly such as Lotus Petal and Elvish Spirit Guide, allowing for a fast and powerful combo finish.

The primary focus of the deck is to play aggressive Eldrazi creatures quickly and disrupt the opponent's game plan using cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to utilize Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to accelerate the casting of powerful Eldrazi threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. With a mix of disruptive spells and resilient creatures, the deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game before they can establish their own strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo using Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill your opponent's library. The deck also utilizes cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to help assemble the combo and generate card advantage. Additionally, cards like Force of Will and Metallic Rebuke provide disruption and protection for your combo. The deck aims to win the game quickly through the combo while controlling the board and interacting with the opponent's strategy.

The deck revolves around quickly putting powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn into play using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. It aims to dominate the game by cheating these big threats into play ahead of schedule, overwhelming the opponent's defenses. The deck also includes a number of counterspells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm to protect its combo pieces. The goal is to efficiently assemble the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Chalice of the Void, Magus of the Moon, and Blood Moon, while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf. The deck also aims to finish the game quickly with cards like Fury, Sundering Eruption, and The One Ring. The use of fast mana sources like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors allows the deck to deploy its threats quickly and overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf. The deck aims to control the board with powerful removal spells like Fury and Sundering Eruption, while also utilizing the ramp from cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Chrome Mox to quickly develop a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and The One Ring provide additional utility and power to the deck.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board through disruption and removal spells while also utilizing creatures with strong offensive capabilities. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Amped Raptor and Ocelot Pride, supported by powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah. Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize allow for hand disruption, while Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment provide additional control elements. This deck seeks to quickly overwhelm the opponent while disrupting their game plan, leading to a swift victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo between Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to draw through the deck and quickly assemble a win condition. It also utilizes powerful disruptive elements like Force of Will and Teferi, Time Raveler to protect the combo and control the game. The deck also includes efficient removal and tutoring options like Swords to Plowshares and Green Sun's Zenith. The mana base is optimized to support the combo and ensure consistent casting of key spells, with some support from utility lands like Karakas and Dryad Arbor.

The deck revolves around using Doomsday to set up a winning combination of cards, with Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Thassa's Oracle as key pieces. Cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Teferi, Time Raveler help dig through the deck and protect the combo, while cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual help generate mana to execute the combo efficiently. The deck also includes disruption cards like Force of Will and Daze to counter opponent's spells and keep the combo safe. The goal is to assemble the combo and win the game in a single turn.

The main concept of this UWx Control deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and manipulating card advantage through various card draw effects. The deck includes a mix of counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce, removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending, along with card advantage engines like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. By effectively disrupting the opponent's strategy and generating card advantage, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and eventually win the game through control and attrition.

The main concept of this Dragon Stompy deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's strategy by playing powerful aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf, while also utilizing disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon to control the game. The deck aims to quickly build up a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent, leveraging cards like Sundering Eruption and Fury for additional damage. With a focus on speed, disruption, and aggressive plays, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures, using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, and then bring them back into play with Reanimate. The deck also includes disruption spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces and control the opponent's game plan. Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty provide strong threats that can close out the game quickly once they hit the battlefield. Overall, the deck aims to outpace and overwhelm the opponent with its graveyard recursion and disruptive spells.
